attributes.comment:
I oppose the raising of these fees. International adoption is an expensive process
already and the raising of these fees, especially to this degree, will cause more
children to never find a home. I have adopted two daughters from China. Both
times, many of the major hurdles I faced came from our own US government
processes, not from China. If I felt like the processes had improved since that
time, I might be in favor of a small increase, but I don't believe that has happened,
so I don't think fees should be raised.

Thank you for your consideration of my opinion!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Melanie Mays
